mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DP_Member (dp_name, dp_pwd, dp_findpwd_q, dp_findpwd_a, dp_nick, dp_tel1, dp_tel2, dp_tel3, dp_addr, dp_email1, dp_email2, dp_point) VALUES (#{dp_name}, #{dp_pwd}, #{dp_findpwd_q}, #{dp_findpwd_a}, #{dp_nick}, #{dp_tel1}, #{dp_tel2}, #{dp_tel3}, #{dp_addr}, #{dp_email1}, #{dp_email2}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT dp_name FROM DP_Member WHERE dp_name= #{dp_name}
SELECT dp_nick FROM DP_Member WHERE dp_nick= #{dp_nick}
SELECT dp_id FROM DP_Member WHERE dp_name= #{dp_name} and dp_pwd= #{dp_pwd}
mapper.delete: DELETE dp_id FROM DP_Member WHERE dp_id= #{dp_id}
